channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Congressman McHenry announces joint hearings to address market structure around digital assets
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Patrick McHenry suggested that the hearings will look to add to the regulatory efforts being done on the bipartisan bill led by Senator Cynthia Lummis and Senator Kirsten Gillibrand.

item.title: Fed, NYDFS assess their supervisory performance after March’s big bank failures
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Internal reviews of the supervision of Silicon Valley Bank and Signature Bank have been released, showing weaknesses on the part of the banks’ regulators as well as management.

item.title: Crypto Biz: Google bullish on blockchain, UK’s $125M AI pledge, Voyager and Binance
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: This week’s Crypto Biz explores Google expanding its Web3 program, the U.K.’s $125 AI pledge, FTX selling LedgerX and Binance.US backing out of its Voyager purchase.

item.title: UK Treasury seeks input on taxing DeFi staking and lending: Finance Redefined
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The UK Treasury is seeking input on taxing the DeFi space, and on provisions around staking and lending.

item.title: Venmo will enable fiat-to-crypto payments in May
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Users of the mobile payment service will also be able to receive crypto through a QR code or external crypto address.

item.title: Tax law researchers propose IRS framework for deducting crypto losses
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: A recently published study appears to advocate for the isolation of crypto assets from other tax deductions where losses are concerned.

item.title: How would a US debt default impact Bitcoin?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Cointelegraph analyst and writer Marcel Pechman explains how a U.S. debt default could impact Bitcoin and the larger cryptocurrency market.

item.title: What is Auto-GPT, and why does it matter?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tayyub Yaqoob
item.description: Auto-GPT is a powerful tool for task automation that combines natural language processing and deep learning to generate human-like text responses.

item.title: Cointelegraph accelerator program welcomes Brickken: A new step in asset tokenization
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph
item.description: By participating in Cointelegraph’s Accelerator Program, Brickken aims to support companies through the entire tokenization cycle.

item.title: Mauritius planning to launch pilot project for retail digital rupee late this year
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The governor of the Bank of Mauritius told a meeting of central bank technologists about the development of the island nation’s CBDC ambitions.

item.title: Price analysis 4/28: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, MATIC, SOL, DOT, LTC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin and select altcoins continue to face selling at higher levels, a sign that the bears have not yet given up.

item.title: Bitcoin price holds $29K as US PCE data sparks 90% Fed rate hike bets
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin holds firm around $29,000 as markets escape a “shock” from the week’s main macro event.

item.title: Crypto Stories: Tim Draper tells how his family moved into Bitcoin
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Billionaire venture capitalist Tim Draper made a turn in his family’s path to Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies.

item.title: Where crypto can grow: Digital asset regulations around the world
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: While many countries have sped up their efforts to regulate cryptocurrencies following a crisis-filled 2022, most still lack a clear framework for the industry to build around.

item.title: Google Cloud to optimize Polygon zkEVM scaling performance
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Polygon Labs and Google Cloud will team up in a multi-year agreement to drive the development and adoption of the Ethereum scaling protocol’s infrastructure and developer tools.

item.title: 9 common interview questions for AI jobs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Guneet Kaur
item.description: AI job seekers should be prepared to answer common interview questions on their experience, skills and approach to AI-focused projects.

item.title: Not funny: Comedy club NFT debacle teaches lesson in transparency
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Diana Aguilar
item.description: What started with a comedy club would later become a notorious case of legal loopholes and frustration for the nonfungible token community.

item.title: The Bitcoin transition: How hodlers can become changemakers and drive adoption
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joe Hall
item.description: “When you think about Bitcoin, it’s potentially the largest country or one of the largest countries today. But it’s digital and it’s spread out everywhere,” Jeff Booth told Cointelegraph.

item.title: ChatGPT, Midjourney, other AI tools to make their way into EU legislation
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The bill will classify the risk of AI tools and force developers of generative-AI applications to disclose the use of any copyrighted materials.

item.title: Binance to reenter Japan via acquired regulated exchange SEBC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Although no official date is mentioned for the launch of Binance Japan, the notice stated that the exchange could start after June.

item.title: European bankers on digital euro: ‘ECB has no interest in users’ personal data’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: While anonymity still stands as the core issue of a European CBDC, the inevitable competition with private banks also raises questions.

item.title: Revolut taps Koinly for automated cryptocurrency tax reports
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Revolut has partnered with Koinly to integrate cryptocurrency tax report services for users.

item.title: Analysts at odds over Fed, US debt ceiling impact on Bitcoin price
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: A political deadlock looms over the U.S. debt ceiling and its potential impact on the price of Bitcoin, which is already up 75% in 2023.

item.title: 46% of millennials across major economies own crypto: Bitget research
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The study featured over 255,000 respondents across 26 countries in four age groups.

item.title: Hong Kong regulator requires banks to open accounts for crypto firms
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Hong Kong’s central bank has urged banks to provide services to crypto firms before receiving a license.

item.title: KuCoin confirms an exchange user is behind alleged daily rug pulls
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: A community member identified a wallet address that allegedly launched several memecoin rug pulls daily for almost two years.

item.title: Bitcoin sell-off next? Binance BTC balance shoots up $1.5B in 1 month
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Binance is up over 50,000 BTC in a month, in sharp contrast to other major exchanges, while data suggests the market is going short BTC at $30,000.

item.title: Ex-CFO who stole $5M to trade crypto and ‘meme stocks’ gets 3 years in prison
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Cooper Morgenthau embezzled $5 million from three different companies and lost almost all of it trading cryptocurrencies and “meme stocks.“

item.title: UK Treasury seeks input on taxing DeFi staking and lending
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: The proposed regulatory changes seek to simplify how DeFi returns are taxed and reduce the “administrative burden” for taxpayers.

item.title: AI tool created by JPMorgan analyzes Fed speeches to signal trades
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: The investment bank uses OpenAI's ChatGPT to sniff out trading signals from Federal Reserve policy statements.
